title: Bug 18335 - Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
description:
When performing the following actions in F1:
1. Maximize a view in any perspective.

Expected Behavior:
- The maximized view should be present and all other views in the perspective should remain visible.

Observed Behavior:
- All the contents of the perspective (views, layout info) are lost when a view is maximized. Only the maximized view is actually present and all other views are missing from the perspective.

Additional Information:
- It appears that the view maximize code replaces the page layout with a temporary one that contains only the maximized view.
